mapper.insert: insert into commodity(commodity_name, price, described, channel_id) values(#{commodityName}, #{price}, #{described}, #{channel.id})
mapper.select: select self.id, self.commodity_name, self.price, c.id as channel_id, c.name as channel_name, i.id as image_id, i.path as image_path from commodity self left join channel c on self.channel_id=c.id left join commodity_image i on self.id=i.commodity_id group by self.id

select self.id, self.commodity_name, self.price, c.id as channel_id, c.name as channel_name, i.id as image_id, i.path as image_path from commodity self left join channel c on self.channel_id=c.id left join commodity_image i on self.id=i.commodity_id where c.id = #{id} group by self.id

select self.id, self.commodity_name, self.price, self.described, c.id as channel_id, c.name as channel_name, i.id as image_id, i.path as image_path, k.id as k_id, k.name as k_name, v.id as v_id, v.name as v_name
from commodity self left join channel c on self.channel_id=c.id left join commodity_image i on self.id=i.commodity_id left join commodity_attribute k on (k.commodity_id = self.id) and ISNULL(k.key_id) left join commodity_attribute v on v.commodity_id = self.id and v.key_id = k.id where self.id = #{id}

select self.id, self.commodity_name, self.price, i.id as image_id, i.path as image_path
from commodity self left join commodity_image i on self.id=i.commodity_id where self.channel_id in (select channel.id from channel where channel.father_id in (select channel.id from channel where channel.`name` = #{channelName})) group by self.id
select self.id from commodity self where self.id = #{id}
